description: This is a fun-loving event where we can take a stroll in the campus premises. There are lots of amusing stuff we can arrange here, including: badminton, skating, yoga, singing, dancing, crafts hub, one-minute chess, carom board game, many indoor games, and also performance stage for amateur artists. Everyone will have an opportunity to express themselves and show their hidden talent.
rules: Any kind of misconduct or rude behavior will not be tolerated in the ongoing events
Students must have their college id-cards.
Registration_type: There will be no sort of registration.
